mission_context.mission_title: AI/DEV Lab Frontend Overhaul - Professional Customer Support Demo
mission_context.mission_objective: Transform the AI/DEV Lab frontend into a professional, enterprise-grade customer support demo application
mission_context.business_value: Create a showcase-quality frontend that demonstrates AI/DEV Lab capabilities while providing a functional customer support demo platform

executive_summary.overview: The AI/DEV Lab frontend has been completely overhauled from a basic, minimal interface to a professional, enterprise-grade customer support demo application. The transformation includes comprehensive design system implementation, professional toggle switches, enhanced chat interface, separate model configuration panel, and responsive grid system with proper wireframing.
key_achievements: Professional, modern UI design with enterprise-grade aesthetics
Comprehensive design system with CSS custom properties
Interactive toggle switches integrated in header
Enhanced chat interface with improved UX
Separate model configuration panel with sliders and presets
Responsive design that works on all devices
Proper wireframing and grid system implementation
executive_summary.technical_impact: The frontend now serves as a showcase for AI/DEV Lab's technical capabilities, demonstrating professional development practices, modern web standards, and enterprise-grade design principles.
executive_summary.user_experience: Significantly improved user experience with intuitive navigation, professional appearance, and smooth interactions that create a positive impression of the platform's capabilities.
